pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Probabilistic Record Linkage with Missing Data // Implements a Fellegi-Sunter probabilistic record linkage model that allows for missing data and the inclusion of auxiliary information. This includes functionalities to conduct a merge of two datasets under the Fellegi-Sunter model using the Expectation- Maximization algorithm. In addition, tools for preparing, adjusting, and summarizing data merges are included. The package implements methods described in Enamorado, Fifield, and Imai (2019) ''Using a Probabilistic Model to Assist Merging of Large-scale Administrative Records'' doi:10.1017/S0003055418000783 and is available at https://imai.fas.harvard.edu/research/linkage.html.
